text:
Kadayam police have recovered the body of a woman.

Police said the body of P. Chellammal (67) of Mudaliyarpatti near Kadayam, which had been stuffed in a bag, was lying near an irrigation tank on Monday night. When Kadayam police investigated the case, it was revealed that the family of the woman had been embroiled in property dispute. Hence, the police suspect that she might have been murdered as a result of the dispute.
title: Woman found murdered
